name: Saahil Doshi
hero_sentence: Implementing UI designs using flutter to give them life
about_description: I am a flutter developer, with a passion of creating full stack deployable applications with the most optimized backend the most appealing frontend. I have a strong understanding of how things work in huge codebases and work closely with other developers and UI designers to bring their ideas to life. I have had the oppurtunity to work at an emerging social media startup based in Delhi where I was primarily working on the frontend of the deployed app, improving features both for IOS and Android.
